1.content:
You have arrived at Walt Disney World to enjoy your vacation. You have individual bedrooms in your suite, and a common living / kitchen area, and free access in and out. You've stayed together for your arrival day, and have now retired back to the suite, and to your bedrooms for the night.

As you drift to sleep your slumbering thoughts focus on the rides that you had been on, and the people that you had been with and seen around you during the day.


Let’s start by choosing your character:

Tony (Dad, 42, divorced, a self employed writer).

Tamara (17, slim and good looking).

Michael (16, sporty and outgoing. Loves machinery and animals. Just fallen out with his girlfriend at home).

Andy (10, bit shy, good with technology and an ace with computer games).
1.title: Choose your character

choices: You have the body of a 10 year old boy
11.content:
It has been really good being at Disney World with your kids, although are well aware that you’re 25 years older than all of them, and whilst you try to join in, it is not really as good as you would like, having to sit out on Space Mountain, and take the green channel on Mission to Mars, as the more boisterous rides upset your equilibrium.

With your ultimate tickets hung around your necks all meals are included in the parks, and this being Disney you're pretty happy that that could go off on their own quite safely.

Overnight you dreamt that you were able to join your kids on all of the rides and games without having the worries of parenthood, or the aches that come with age.

You wake, and are aware that something is different...

You open your eyes, and...
11.title: Tony

choices: There’s a full range of clothes to fit a 10 year old
All of your adult clothes are still there
111.content:
You don't really want to wake up, but something doesn’t feel right. You open your eyes and look around. The bed is bigger than you remember from last night.

You sit up, and notice the reflection in the mirror opposite the bed – a young boy is looking back at you! You pull back the bedclothes, and indeed you now have the body of a boy – pretty much the same age as Andy. In fact it’s you as you were at 10.

You blink a few times, but nothing changes. Um, interesting. Best dream you’ve had for years – very realistic. Only you knew that you weren’t dreaming, but this was real…

You climbed out of bed. You're still wearing the sleep shorts you had from last night, although they are barely holding up around your waist. You walk across the room to the mirror. Wow. It really was like looking at your youngest son. You had shrunk several inches in height, regained the mop of straw cloured hair you had when you were younger, and your waistline was the slimmest that you could remember it being since, well, since you were ten! You hitch up your shorts to mantain some element of modesty, even though you're on your own.

Then you notice a card propped on the dresser.

“Good morning Tony,” it read, “At Walt Disney World we take your dreams seriously, and our motto is that here your dreams can come true. Enjoy the day!”

Unbelievable, you thought. Oh, well. Real or dreaming, guess you can only try to make the most of the opportunity!

You realise that you won’t be able to do much with just these sleep shorts on, so you head for the closet, wondering what you’ve got that might fit your smaller body. You open the closet, and…

1111.content:
You open the closet and find a selection of boy's clothes that fit you. Phew, that’s a relief! You grab a tee shirt, shorts and a pair of trainers and get dressed.

OK, what next. Guess you’d better venture out to the family area, although you’re now a bit worried. What are your children going to think when they see you younger than they are? This could take some explaining, and you’re not sure you had any answers.

You opened the door, and went out to the living area.

It’s empty. Well, that’s probably for the best. You realise you’re hungry, so get yourself some cereal and a glass of juice, and sit at the kitchen table to eat it.

The door to Michael’s bedroom opens and Michael steps out. He glances across at you.

“Um, morning.” you say.

“Oh, right, yeah.” He responds. “Look,” he continues, ”I’ve got an invitation to drive the steam train around the park today, but I’ve got to be there early. Can you tell Dad I’ll see him later? Cheers.” With that Michael looped his ultimate pass lanyard around his neck, grabbed his baseball hat, and left the suite.

Well, that saved an explanation. You obviously look enough like Andy that Michael assumed you were him.

You hear a noise behind you. You turn to see Andy’s bedroom door swings open, and his head comes into view.

“Hello,” he says. “Who are you?”

What do you say? Do you…
1111.title: Facing the family...

choices: You head for the rides together
11111.content:
“Um.” You say, stalling for a little time while you think. “Don’t suppose you had a card beside your bed when you woke up?”

“Sure did, “Andy replies. “Said that my dreams would come true.”

“OK, so what did you dream about last night?”

“Dunno really. I think I was riding Space Mountain with my Dad, but that’ll never happen. He has to sit out every time ‘cos of his stomach.” He gave a quizzical look at you. “Are you my twin I didn’t know I had or something?”

“Not quite,” you reply “but pretty close. Do you believe in magic?”

“What, card tricks and things. No, they’re just tricks. Make something appear out of nothing in front of me, and I might believe it. Why?”

“The card by your bed summed it up pretty good – seems that here all your dreams will come true – and mine too... I’m your Dad.”

“Oh yeah. Bollocks! Dunno what planet you're from, but I’ll get my Dad to sort you out.” He heads for your bedroom door, pushing it open when he gets there. Of course the room is empty.

Your immediate temptation is to reprimand him for his language, but you hold your tongue. You follow him into your room. Andy is standing by your bed reading the “Good morning” message, and noticed the child sized clothes around the room. “Wow – are you really my Dad? Shit – that’s cool!”

Not quite the way you would have liked him to phrase it, but guess it was as big a surprise for him to deal with as you.

“What else can you do?” Andy asks.

“I don’t think it’s that kind of magic.” You say. “I think it picks up on your dreams, so guess I’m like this until tomorrow, and then we’ll see what happens next.”

“Wow. So what are we doing today then, um, Dad?”

“Think for today you’d better just call me Tony.”

You think for a moment. Seems that both your dream and Andy’s had been about enjoying the park together, so why not? “Whatever you fancy” you say. “Let’s hit the rides!”
11111.title: Trying to explain

111111.content:
Somehow the fact that your body has been restored to its childhood status has also affected your outlook, and rather than having your usual worries and concerns, you start behaving as if you really are 10. Before long you are both jumping the queues on the bigger rides, pulling stupid faces at the photo shoot cameras, and basically having a whale of a time.

However you do find that when you stop for something for lunch, the double bacon cheeseburger and large drink that you are used to consuming was a bit much for your 10 year old stomach to handle!

By the time you both return to the suite mid-way through the evening you are both shattered. To be honest you really are not used to quite so much exertion, and Andy could certainly dart between the other guests to reach the next ride (or in the case of Space Mountain to rejoin the queue on the same ride 4 times!).

“Good day?” you ask Andy.

“Yeah, brill. Thanks.”

Well, guess that’s the seal of approval from him then!

You consider whether to check on Tamara and Michael to see what sort of day they’ve had, but then reckon (correctly) that they would still be out in the parks for a while longer yet. So you say goodnight to Andy, and head for your bedroom. Wow, you are really so tired, and before you realise it you have crashed out on your bed, and have fallen asleep.

Overnight your mind gently mulls over the activities of the day, storing away the new memories, and pulling together the fuzzy outline of a concept that will become your dream. What are you dreaming about tonight?
111111.title: Hitting the park

1111111.content:
Over the past couple of days, from your different age perspectives, one thing has become clear to you. Walt Disney World is a brilliant place for watching girls, and over the past couple of days you had seen a multitude of the prettiest and sexiest members of the fairer sex. In your dream you break your normal reservations (where you merely ogle as these wondrous beauties go past) and instead pluck up the courage to approach a group of the sexiest girls that you’ve seen, and they are all friendly and welcome you to join them.

You awaken. It is morning.

You can vaguely recall some of your dream. Wow, pretty neat, being able to mix and hang around with those girls. Be fun if you really could! You half open one eye and squint out, and try to determine if you’ve returned to normal or are still a 10 year old boy.

Ah. The truth of the situation then dawns on you. You are:
1111111.title: Dreaming of the fairer sex

11111111.content:
You look down, but your view is obstructed by two mounds of flesh on your chest. You slowly reach out your hand (Which you notice is slimmer and finely manicured) and poke them to see if they are real. Yep. Over night you have turned into a girl!

You slowly rise up, getting used to your new body. You stumble into the bathroom and look into the mirror to see what you look like. The figure in the mirror is like you, but as if you were roughly twenty-two years younger - and a girl. You could easily pass as Tamara's sister. As you ponder that fact, you remember that one of the girls in the dream had looked an awful lot like Tammy...

You realize that you should probably go check on her, since if she was in your dream then you are probably going to end up spending some time with her today anyway. But first, some clothes. You open your closet to find that all of your own clothes have disappeared and replaced by a wardrobe full of fashionable styles suited for your new body. Having brought up a daughter you know full well how a girl should dress, so you quickly select a pair of plain black panties and a bra, then put on a T-shirt and skinny jeans. A few fingers through your hair seems enough to tidy it up, and you head out from your room to locate Tammy.

You peek your head into Tammy's room. "Tam? You there?" You call out, realizing how feminine your voice now sounds.
11111111.title: Whoa!

111111111.content:
Tammy turns her head towards you. "Who are you?" She asks.
"Would you believe me if I said I was your dad?" You reply.
Tam laughs a bit. "After the day I had yesterday I'm inclined to beleive anything! however, I think you'd better prove you're my dad first, and not Micheal or Andy playing a prank on me."
"OK - For your eighth birthday, we went out alone to a restaurant. While we were there, you spilled chocolate milk all over your face, doodled on my arm with crayon, and on the way out, you walked into a lamp post."
Tam's eyes bug out and she runs over and hugs you. "It is you!" She exclaims. "What were you dreaming about?"
"I was dreaming about hanging out with my daughter." You lie.
Tam chuckles. "Well, you picked a good day to dream about that. I dreamed about my friends back home, and today they called me and said they were here! We can hang out with them all day!"
You smile, remembering that some of her closest friends are real stunners. Today was going to be a good day!
Tamara's eyes go up and down your body. "Nice body, but we need to work a bit on your fashion sense," She says.
Within a few minutes, you're in your room with Tam having a blast trying out some of your new clothes. Seems that having a girl's body is affecting your mind the same way being 10 years old had.
Overall, it took under an hour to get both of you properly dressed and styled. "My friends said they'd meet us at the City Hall down on Main Street, then we'll have breakfast."

The two of you head out, both looking forward to a great day.
111111111.title: Hi, Tamara!

choices: A day out with the girls
Stay at home with the girls
11111112.content:
You look around you. You appear to be in a bedroom. You are lying in one bed, and you can see two more beds, both occupied by slumbering occupants. OK, at least that gives you a few minutes to work out where you might be…

You feel down your body with your hands as best you can. Everything seems to be back to normal, in that you are now an adult again, although you suspect that something is different to normal. You don’t appear to have as much body hair as you used to, and your tummy seems firmer and flatter.

Suddenly the door to the room opens, and a girl of around 20 enters. Despite her hair being rather bedraggled she’s a stunner. She has shoulder length blond hair, perfectly featured face, and a body worthy of a beauty queen. She is wearing a Tee shirt, and the clear shape of her breasts and nipples indicate that she doesn’t have anything on underneath. You wonder if she has any panties on, but her Tee is just long enough that you can’t tell.

“Good morning everyone!” she calls.

Oh Jeepers. Now they are going to realise they have an uninvited person in their midst.

Bodies stir and eyes open, and as the other occupants of the room rise from their slumbers you realise that you are in a room otherwise full of women, with two sharing each of the two double beds. You then realise that they are looking at you…

The girl at the door then turns towards you as well…

“Good morning Tony!” I’m Jemma. Welcome to our home!

“Um, good morning.” You respond.

“Sorry I wasn’t around when you arrived, but its looks like you found your bed OK.”

“Um, yes, thanks.” Now you are confused. They were somehow expecting you, and had a bed made up ready?

“Coffee is brewing, so come and grab some while it’s hot. Normal rota for the bathroom girls. I’m sure Tony won’t mind waiting a few minutes.”

As each of the girls climbs out of their beds to start their morning routine, all you can do is watch in amazement as they proceed to walk around in various states of undress. You can feel yourself getting hard, and are mighty glad that you have the bedclothes over you to hide your erection.

After a few minutes Jemma returns, and perches on the edge of your bed. “Hi again! Sorry if you’re not used to having quite such a crowded place, but we find it keeps the costs down. Also looks like you’re the only guy here today, so guess you’re the lucky one – we’ll try not to fight over you too much!”

With your continued look of confusion Jemma continues to talk, basically explaining the set up of the house. As she talks you understand what is going on. You are in a house occupied by airline crews, and as far as they are concerned you are just another flight attendant who needed a place to stay, and are now having a day off before your next flight. So this bevy of beauties are all cabin crew, and appear to have accepted you into their home without question.

OK, so a minor issue of what you are going to wear, as under the bedclothes you are naked, and can’t see anything vaguely appropriate to put on. Based on your recent experiences you assume that there are some clothes nearby. Well, seems that the girls are all very comfortable wondering around with nothing on, so guess you could too.

You swing your legs out of bed, and sit on the edge, with the bed sheet still strategically placed over your groin. You then catch a glimpse of your reflection in a mirror. Well, you’re not yet back to your normal self. You estimate yourself to be early 20’s, but you also have jet black hair and a slightly Mediterranean complexion. Hum, not bad looking.

You locate a clutch bag which seems to have suitable clothes. Pulling on some boxers makes you feel somewhat more confident to walk around, although you’re still a little concerned that this may not hide much if any of the semi naked girls return.

Jemma re-enters the bedroom.

“OK Tony. I understanding you’re only with us for a day, so we wondered what you’d like to do. We’ve got unlimited access tickets to the parks, so we could all go there, or we could just stick around here. Either way I think you’re going to have a lot of attention!”

What will you do?
11111112.title: your new room

111111121.content:
Whilst not strictly here under false pretences, you clearly aren’t quite who Jemma and the girls may think you are, so you decide not to admit having spent the previous day running riot at Magic Kingdom. Instead you tell her that you’d be happy going along with a majority vote. She disappears back to the living room, and you make a dive into the now vacant bathroom to have a shower and a shave, taking the clutch bag with you.

A brief investigation in the bag reveals a neatly folded uniform, and some casual-wear, hopefully suitable for whatever the girls decide.

You proceed to shower, and then discover a number of male toiletries, presumably from a previous occupant, including shaver and gel. Great - although it' rather weird trying to shave a face that's unfamiliar to you. It's sort of you when you were 20, but not quite.

You find briefs, shorts and a polo shirt in the bag, which you slip on. OK, now to face the female contingent, and accept their decision on your fate!

You head out to the living area. There are four girls there, including Jemma. All are dressed now, although with quite a severe amount of flesh showing, and you hadn't previously realised how long girls legs could be - on a couple of the girls you can see an awful lot of leg.

“Coffee is still hot.” Jemma says, indicating the percolator. You pour yourself a cup.

“Any decision on what everyone fancies today?” you ask.

Two of the girls suppress giggles, and one blushes slightly. OK, possibly bad phrasing of the question there.

Jemma, clearly the most senior member of the group, responded. “Yes, by a vote of three to two, we’re going to a park. As you excluded yourself from the vote, you can decide which one we go to.”

A quick head count tells you someone is missing. Jemma seems to notice you checking around the room. “Susie’s popped out for a minute.” She proceeds to introduce you to the others, Becky, Sarah and Terri (the last two being the gigglers).

You drink your coffee, and cereal and toast are also on offer, and chatter with the girls. Fortunately as they’re all off duty, nobody wants to talk ‘shop’, so the conversation is purely social. By the time you all get ready to go you are feeling very comfortable in their company, as if you’ve known them far longer than the 30 minutes or so since the introductions.

“Taxi is waiting outside.” Susie says, and you all pile in.

“Where to?” the driver asks. Oh bugger, you were supposed to have decided that earlier.
111111121.title: Introductions

choices: Sneak out to the park shops
1112.content:
You find that all of your (adult) clothes are still there, and realistically there’s nothing that would fit your 10 year old body any better than the sleep shorts that you’re desperately try to keep hitched up.

Well, you can’t really spend the day in Disney World dressed in just a pair of ill-fitting sleep shorts, so you’d better think of how you can get hold of something suitable.

You look in the mirror again. Yep, you could pass as Andy’s twin, the resemblance so close, and you’re pretty much the same height.

Well, looks like you do have a couple of options. You are currently in the middle of what must be the biggest shopping center in the World for childrens’ clothes (at least those plastered with a Disney logo), so all you have to do is work out how to get hold of some from one of the multitude of outlets in the park. Alternatively you could borrow something from Andy – although you will have to explain why his Dad wants to borrow his clothes!

You check you wallet, and you money and cards are all there, so you pick up a couple of 20’s. Ah, no pockets. You grab your ultimate platinum pass by its lanyard. Yes, you can slip the notes behind the pass in its clip. You loop the lanyard around you neck.

Oh well, let’s see what’s going on outside. You open your bedroom door and step into the living area. There’s nobody there.

What are you going to do:
1112.title: Nothing but your sleep shorts

choices: You have the body of a 17 year old boy
You have the body of a 16 year old boy
112.content: You open your eyes and.....
112.title: Something else

choices: There is an invitation card for the Bibbiddi Bobbiddi Boutique by your bed
You have the body of an 8 year old girl
12.content:
Well, you are at Magic Kingdom, the home of princesses, and during the previous day you could not fail to notice a multitude of little girls dressed up as Disney Princesses, with their hair styled, the glittery makeup, and the full princess costumes.

When you were younger you had really wanted to dress up like this, but as you got older such thoughts disappeared from your mind, although had always envied those who were able to.

However, despite now being 17, and far too old for such a little girlie activity, you did have a sneaky peek in the boutique door as you passed, and as you slumbered you subsconscious mind was gently mulling over what might have been ...

You wake up, and are immediately aware that there is something different. You open your eyes, and ...
12.title: Tamara

choices: go to the Boutique for a laugh
121.content:
You rub your eyes, and look again. There is a silver invitation card propped up on your bedside table, where you couldn't miss it.

"Welcome Tamara", it read. "We are expecting you today at the Bibbiddi Bobbiddi Boutique located in Cinderella's Castle. Here we will transform you into a Disney princess with hairstyling, shimmering make-up, and a manicure, plus Princess Sash, Princess Costume and Shoes, Crown, Wand, and Imaging Package. We look forward to seeing you!"

OK, you think to yourself. Nice idea, but whoever sent this obviously had no idea that you're twice the age of their normal clients, and you'd stand out somewhat! Besides, even if you wanted to they wouldn't have a princess costume to fit you.

As you lay there, you think back to your overnight dreams, what little you can remember of them, and recall imagining yourself being dressed up as a princess. Um, probably coincidence.

You get out of bed and head for the bathroom. After a shower, you get dressed in your standard vacation wear of Tee shirt and shorts, and head out into the living room to have some breakfast. Just before you leave you decide to grab the invitation, and stuff it into the back pocket of your shorts.

As you reach the kitchen there's nobody there, so you grab a bowl of cereal, and sit down to decide what to do next.

Do you...
121.title: The invitation

choices: Go in - but with some conditions
Forget it - I'm out of here
1212.content:
Well, you had nothing planned for today, and as the invitation did look quite official you reckon that they must be expecting you. However, as your only knowledge of the Bibbiddi Bobbiddi Boutique is that they cater for little girls you can only assume that someone has misread your age, so you decide to head down to tell them of the mistake.

Fortunately this isn't far to go, as your suite in in the upper regions of Cinderella's castle, and the Boutique is down below. You make sure you have the invitation with you, and head downstairs.

When you reach the entrance to the Boutique there is a short queue of mums with pre-teenage girls, and you have no choice but to wait at the end of the line. After a couple of minutes you are greeted by a Boutique staff member.

"Look, I have this invitation..." you show the card that you had received "but there seems to have been a mistake."

"Oh dear, I am sorry about that. We will do everything we can to rectify that. "What is the problem?"

"Well," you reply, "I think somebody must have misunderstood my age, as I don't really think I'd fit in here terribly well !"

"Nonsense! You are at Walt Disney World! There is no age limit to happiness!" She presses a few keys on here computer keyboard. "So, you are Tamara Wetherell?"

"Yes, that's me." you respond.

"Well, you are definitely booked in for today. We have you booked for the ultimate package, and all non-chargeable. That means you can have absolutely anything you want!”

"Yes, but the point is that all of your, um, clients, are ten years younger than me. Somehow I don't think I would fit in, and you certainly would have anything big enough to fit me."

The assistant looks straight at you, and you can tell she is totally serious. "Tamara, as I said, you are at Walt Disney World. You would be very welcome to come inside, and we can transform you exactly as you wish."

What will you do?
1212.title: The Bibbiddi Bobbiddi Boutique

choices: You start to regress in age
12122.content:
You know full well that the whole thing is pretty ludicrous, but you can't get the memory from your childhood of wanting to get dressed up like a princess out of your mind. Well you're here, and it won't cost you anything, so you decide to give it a go.

"OK," you say to the assistant, "I'm here and I shall stay. However, you will have a job on your hands. I dreamed of this when I was about 10, so I want you to make me feel like I'm 10 again being made up as a princess!"

"That would be a perfectly acceptable condition, Tamara. Before we start, would you like to select your princess outfit?" She leads you to a curtain which she draws back revealing a selection of beautiful dresses - although you couldn't help notice they're all far too small for you. "What will be you choice?"

You scan through them and notice a gorgeous red chiffon dress, with a spaghetti strap, silver beading, high waistband and layered pleated skirts, with a silver shimmer to the material. Your heart pauses briefly as you gaze at this wonder, and suddenly you realize this is what you really want, what you really, REALLY, want.

"Wow! That is so nice!" you say.

"Then it shall be yours, and you will fit it to perfection. May your transformation begin!"

Um, shouldn't she have said it will fit you to perfection... probably just a slip of the tongue, you think.

"Please come this way." You are directed through an opening where you can see changing rooms, make up tables and mirrors, and a couple of little girls having their hair tied back and glittery make up applied by Disney make up artists. You walk through the opening , and ....
12122.title: the red chiffon dress

choices: You slowly return to your real age
121222.content:
You enter the dressing room, and suddenly feel very excited. Despite your knowledge that you're really too old for this it all seems right, and you know this is going to be really good. You are seated at one of the make up stations, and you look at your reflection in the large mirror. Well, yes, you know that you will never fit in that dress, after all, you are 16 now, and no, 15, isn't it. Your memory seems a bit fuzzy. Best not to worry too much. Getting the dress to fit will be the the attendant's problem, not yours. You look again at your reflection, and your 14 year old reflection looks back at you. You get the feeling that something is happening to you, but you're not at all sure what, but it's OK 'cos you're nearly a teenager now, and you can look after yourself. By the time the make up assistant comes to see you you have regressed to being a 10 year old in both body and mind, although with a residual knowledge of where you are staying, and what brought you to the boutique.

"Hello Tamara," a friendly voice sounds beside you. "My name is Marcia, and I shall help to transform you into a beautiful princess today."

Now you have trouble containing your excitement. Your recent memory is hidden from you, and you are just a very bubbly 10 year old fulfilling her ultimate ambition. You cannot help but grin from ear to ear.

After around 30 minutes your hair is plaited, make up applied, and you are dressed in you chosen red chiffon dress, with matching red sandals, and you have a photo shoot. Finally you are presented to Cinderella, and awarded your certificate to verify your Royal status.

So, the make over is complete, and it's now time to leave the boutique. What happens now?
121222.title: Counting down....

122.content:
You gradually become aware of your surroundings. You don't really want to let go of your dream, as it was one of your best for ages. Daddy had taken you to the make-up salon in Cinderella's Castle, and you had been dressed up as a Princess, and it was really nice'.

However, you also became aware that you need a wee, so your slumbering must come to an end to satisfy your body's needs.

You open you eyes and look around. Then you remember that you're staying at Walt Disney World, and, wow, isn't your room big. You sit up, and catch your reflection in the mirror on the closet door, and something doesn't quite fit. You look more closely ' yes that's you alright. The unkempt mop of strawberry blonde hair over your little body dressed in your Minnie Mouse nightie. However, you seem to have memories about being older than the eight years old that you are'.

Realisation suddenly returns. You aren't eight, you're seventeen. Only you can see full well that you're eight. Are you still dreaming? You pinch yourself on your arm. Ouch! Well, that was conclusive. You then look down at your body. God! You're wearing a Minnie Mouse nightie! You wouldn't be seen dead in one of those! You also realise how petite you are now, and a quick pat on the front of your nightie confirms that you've lost your two nicest assets.

OK, so what the hell's going on?

Then you notice a card propped on the dresser. It was pink, with glitter around the edges.

'Good morning Tammy,' it read, 'At Walt Disney World we take your dreams seriously, and our motto is that here your dreams can come true.

We are expecting you today at the Biddidi Bobbidi Boutique. Here we will transform you into a Disney Princess with hairstyling, shimmering make-up, and a manicure, plus Princess Sash, Princess Costume and Shoes, Crown, Wand, and Imaging Package. We look forward to seeing you!"

Enjoy the day!'

'Oh shit!' you say aloud, in what turns out to be a high pitched squeal. Oh blimey. Naturally you've got an 8 years old's voice as well.

Are you going to be stuck like this forever? You read the card again, and remember your dream. 'Oh shit!' you say again.

Looks like this may be your own fault, in a funny sort of way. Well, doesn't seem to be much you can do about it anyway, so guess you'd just as well make the most of it.

What first? You still need a wee, so you head to the bathroom, yanking off the nightie over your head on route. You then decide to have a shower, patting yourself dry afterwards with what seems to be an enormous fluffy white towel. Then you attempt to brush through your hair, remembering that this seemed to take forever when you were young getting rid of the tangles.

OK, what to wear? Well, you certainly hadn't gone to bed in a Minnie nightie, so hopefully there would be something else here for you to wear too. You return to your bedroom and look in the closet.

Not much of a selection, but there are some small Tees and shorts. You look for underwear, but find only little panties but no bras. Oh, right - no need for a bra now.

You get dressed in a purple Tinkerbell Tee and a pair of shorts so tight that you'd probably be arrested if you tried wearing them at 17, and consider what to do now.

If this has happened to you, then it stands to reason that the rest of your family have somehow been affected as well. So you decide to venture out of your room to see what's happening.

You open your bedroom door. It's quiet out in the living area. You take a deep breath and step out.

choices: It’s the little girl who was in the Boutique
1222.content:
The room is empty. You are a little relieved at not having to face your family quite like this. You pour yourself a juice from the fridge and grab a piece of toast for your breakfast.

You have your Ultimate Pass strung around your neck, your Bibbidi Bobbidi Boutique invite in the ‘Disney Princesses’ purse that you found hanging in your closet, and you’re ready to hit the park. You leave a note for your Dad to tell him that you’re going to be busy today – although you decide not to mention that you’re now only 8 years old – and you let yourself out of the suite.

The invitation implied that you should be there early – so that you can then enjoy the rest of the day ‘as a princess’ so you head straight there. You wait your turn at the ‘check in’ desk behind another girl of around your new age – although she was there with a multitude of other family members.

“Oh, hello little girl. Are you on your own?” Uh? Oh - someone was speaking to you. You look up and saw one of the staff members looking down at you. “Do you have an appointment dear?”

Somehow you feel like a little girl again, and seem to have lost much of your normal confidence. “Um, yes.” You open your purse and pull out the invitation, and hand this over, suddenly wondering if it is a genuine invitation – after all you hadn’t actually booked anything yourself.

“Just a moment,” the girl answered, “I’ll just find your booking on the system.”

Somehow you had a strange urge that maybe this was just a big joke, and this would be the idea time to do a runner, but your legs seem to have turned to jelly, so you stayed put.

“Here we are,” the girl said. “Hi Tamara. We have you booked for the ultimate package today, and all non-chargeable. Well, that’s unusual, but means you can have absolutely anything you want!” She scanned around you. “Um, are you on your own? Normally parents like to come to watch as well….”

“No,“ You answered truthfully. “My parents are divorced and I’m staying here with my Dad and little brothers. Think he’s probably with them now.” As soon as you said it you realise that this implies your brothers are both younger than 8. Well, guess that makes it more convincing.

You are aware that the assistant is still looking at you, with a touch of sympathy in her face. Oh God, you think. Please don’t feel sorry for me! “I think they’ll be calling in later to see how I’m getting on….” That seemed to satisfy her, and she beckoned for you to follow her into the boutique.

Two hours later you emerged, with your hair neatly plaited, with curls that you didn’t realise you had, pink and purple ribbons, glittery (oh whoops, that would be shimmery) make up and eye shadow, and the best Cinderella gown in the boutique. You had quickly discarded the normal range of Chinese made nylon frocks, and instead opted for the more costly embroidered chiffon version from Europe. Whilst you realise that it doesn’t show off your figure as you would like, having lost the majority of your feminine curves with your age reduction overnight, it did feel smooth and sexy against your skin. Besides, in the heat of the Florida sun, you were quite confident that you’d be a lot cooler in this than the standard nylon outfits!

You rather enjoyed the included photo-shoot at the end, and felt really quite glamorous, despite the emphasis on glitter. You arranged for the photos to be sent to your suite, and now you’re ready to enjoy the park in your new role as a rather diminutive Disney princess.

Of course the downside to this was that you were on your own, and you knew that even as a seventeen year old it’s more fun with company. As an eight year old this is going to be a bit tedious.

“Excuse me.” You turn in response to the voice behind you.
1222.title: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boutique

12221.content:
You are now facing another little princess. It’s the girl who had been ahead of you when you checked in.

“Hello, my name is Samantha.” She said. “Didn't your Daddy come to pick you up?”

“Um, no.” You reply. “Guess he’s busy with my brothers.”

“You can come with us, if you’d like.” She was standing beside a boy in his late teens.

Wow, he’s nice, you think to yourself. You’re immediately tempted to accompany them quite readily!

“My parents decided to go to the Hall of Presidents. Boring or what! So they’ve left me with my brother for now. Say hello to Kyle.”

You say hello, and introduce yourself. Well, looks like you have some company now after all.

While Kyle was not really happy about escorting his little sister, he was under strict instructions from his parents, so suffered his fate in silence. Meanwhile you found yourself quite attracted to him, and tried to find any excuse you could to get closer to him, either holding his hand, or pretending to be afraid on the rides so that you could snuggle up against him. He didn’t seem to mind. In fact you though he quite enjoyed the attention – meanwhile Samantha was quite happy having someone else with her of her own age (or so she thought). So everyone was happy.

Eventually Samantha’s family rejoined with them, and you decide that it’s time to separate. You explain that you’ve just seen your Dad in the queue to “It’s a Small World”, so you think you’d better join him. This satisfied Sam’s parents, who were a bit worried about you being unaccompanied. You thanked Samantha, and gave her a hug. Then you thanked Kyle for looking after you, and stretching up on your tip-toes gave him a kiss, perhaps lingering just a little longer than an 8 year old’s kiss should be. Then you wave bye-bye and disappeared into the crowds.

Phew! That was OK whilst it lasted, but you didn’t fancy going around with Samantha’s entire family, and her constant childish banter was getting a bit much for you anyway. However, if you come across Kyle again when you’re back to normal you may be tempted to spend a little more time with him…

The remainder of the day you spend dipping in and out of the rides, although it really isn’t so much fun on your own – especially dressed as a princess, so you decide to head back to the suite.

Well, despite your initial reservations about the Bibbidi Bobbidi Boutique, you actually quite enjoyed the experience.

You return to your room and take off your Cinderalla dress, finding a hanger in the closet to hang it up. You find the Minnie Mouse nightie lying on the floor where you had discarded it earlier, and pull this on.

Then you sit at the desk, and open your diary. Well, this has been an interesting day – how can you summarise this? You start writing, with your handwriting still reflecting the block style of an 8 year old, rather than your usual scrawl.

After a while you realise that you are really quite tired, so head over to your bed, and within minutes you are fast asleep.

Meanwhile your subconscious mind continues pondering as you drift into and out of dreams. In the end your mind settles down, and you have a dream about …

You think how Amy would act in a situation like this, something that is surprisingly easy. You grab your hand a little bit firmer and start to walk a little bit faster. "Come on!" you say, "There are so many other things to do!" For a second you're surprised that you also have Amy's voice now.

You...NO, you decide to stop looking at the other you as yourself and decide looking at it like it is Michael.
You are Amy for the rest of the day, so you have to see the world like her. Thus, Michael, your boyfriend, starts to smile and also begins to walk a little bit harder.

"That's the spirit Amy! You never know what might happen. For all we know this could be our last day together." Yo... no...Michael says. You smile, recognizing the "Live every day like your last" - mentality you also have.

"So, where are we going now?" You ask Michael.
131122121212.title: Follow your dreams!

1311221212122.content: You decide that you'd had enough of Magic Kingdom for the moment, and decide to head to one of the other parks. Michael walks behind you as you head out from the front of the park towards the monorail station. But were will you go? The old you wants to go to Animal Kingdom, but you know that Amy never liked animals and is more into action. Thus if you really act as Amy you have to choose Disney's Hollywood Studios. What will you do?
1311221212122.title: Take the monorail

13112212121222.content:
Well, despite now inhabiting a version of Amy's body, you know full well that you aren't Amy, so Animal Kingdom it will be! This way both you, and the new version of yourself should be happy. You lead Michael out of the park and head for the bus bays looking for the service to Animal Kingdom, then you both board the waiting bus. It has crossed your mind how you could effectively be here twice. Obviously you know how you're here, but Michael clearly wasn't you, and seemed to just appear...

"So um, how are you enjoying your stay here?" you ask

"Oh, it's absolutely brill. I was able to drive the steam train yesterday. Last night I dreamt of you, and today here you are! Can't ask for anything more than that!" He learns across and gives you a big kiss, which leaves you almost breathless.

Well, that's a bit worrying. Somehow Michael seems to think he is you, or perhaps somehow he is. That's pretty weird.
However you had decided the best, if not only course of action, was to go along with this.

The bus arrives at Animal Kingdom, and you make your way to the entrance, remembering to have your photograph taken by the cast member on the way in. You were asked to pose a couple of times, and for one shot Michael stood behind you with his arms wrapped around your waist, and you really felt comfortable with him so close.

"Amy, can we go on the Kali River Rapids please?" Michael asks. "I really love that ride."

"Of course!" you reply. God - you hadn't realized how polite you could be! You walk had in hand towards the Asian area of the park, and join the queue for the River Rapids ride. You are now getting a bit more comfortable being a girl, and being on the receiving end of admiring glances from the boys going past!

You reach the ride and both clamber on board one of the circular rafts, making sure you sit side by side.

Then...
13112212121222.title: Animal Kingdom

choices: You both head into the Jungle Trek
131122121212221.content:
You place your shoulder bag in the waterproof bin the in center of the raft, and sit next to Michael. As he pulls the seat belt across your waist you become acutely aware of the implications of this ride, as your denim shorts are now getting quite damp from residual water on the seat. You then realize that things have changed since the last time you rode on the River Rapids, namely that you are now female, and whilst you may previously have been fairly unconcerned at getting drenched, now you are not quite so sure…

Before you have time to give this issue much consideration the raft starts moving, and within a few seconds has reached the ramp carrying you up to the free flowing river. Well, you really don’t have much of a choice but to enjoy the ride and worry about the consequences later. As the raft reaches the top of the ramp you find yourself facing backward, so looking back down the ramp, and unaware that a huge fountain of water has erupted immediately behind you. The first indication of something happening was the look on the faces of the couple sitting directly opposite you, and within seconds a cascade of water falls over Michael and you.

Your silk blouse is now clinging tightly to you, with the shape of your breasts clearly showing through the material. Your shorts are now totally saturated. Well, you recall that Amy was never ashamed of her body, so you decide not to worry.

The ride continues, and with the bumping around of the raft and the looseness of the seat belt over your waist (being somewhat slimmer than you had been before), you hold on to Michael’s hand for support, and fairly inevitably he is happy to hold your hand quite tightly in return.

After getting drenched a further couple of times the raft returns to the boarding circle, and you both clamber off, and drip happily back over the walkway back towards the park, still hand in hand. Somehow you are feeling more and more comfortable in your new body, and weirdly quite comfortable in what is effect your own company, walking alongside what is a version of yourself.

“Want another go?” Michael asks. You look across to the entrance and realize that there is a very short queue waiting, so you both duck under the rope barrier and tag on the end. Within a couple of minutes you are again being ushered forwards, and inevitably have another drenching.

As you leave the ride for the second time, there doesn’t seem to be a dry patch on either of you, and you are glad that it’s a hot sunny day.

You return to the ride’s main entrance just behind Expedition Everest, and try to decide what to do next. Michael pulls off his tee-shirt and starts wringing the water out of it. You wish you could do the same. You gaze at him, and find yourself watching him with a weird sense of fulfillment, and then you wonder why on earth you broke up with him, as you realize he is quite a catch.

WHOA! Hang on there! What the hell are you thinking? Pull yourself together girl! I mean boy! Blimey, you’re getting settled in Amy’s body just a little too snugly now. You’re almost starting to think you are Amy!

You mentally pull yourself together, and try to regain a focused perspective.

OK, what now?
131122121212221.title: A wet ride

choices: Head towards the Disney Outfitters on Discovery Island
1311221212122211.content:
Suddenly Michael pulls you towards him, and gives you another full on smacker. Your new feminine instincts cut back into play, and you reciprocate, and you spend the next couple of minutes having a really heavy snog, with Michael's hands gradually working their way down your back until they clasp around your butt, squeezing gently in time with the thrusts of his tongue.

"God, it's really good seeing you again," he says "I really have missed you. I really wish we could go somewhere quiet so that we could get out of these wet things...."

Now your head is really muddled. You know full well that this is you (or at least a version of you) hitting on you, and you are not really who you appear to be, but your body is telling you that you want this to go on.. but how and where? You're standing in the middle of a Disney Park - not the ideal place to start undressing! What are you going to do?
1311221212122211.title: Michael kisses you

1311221212122212.content:
“Hey Amy!” Michael starts. “Do you fancy seeing the tigers? We’re right by the Jungle Trek. Might as well see them now as we’re here…”

“Yeah, OK.” You respond. He throws his wet tee-shirt over one shoulder, grabs your hand, and you walk together towards the entrance. Somehow you are envious as you would similarly like to pull off your wet blouse, although to be honest given the opportunity that would probably be quickly followed by the rest of your clothes, as they are now clinging to your wet skin, and you’d like to dry them out a bit. However, not really the type of activity a young lady should be considering in the middle of a Disney park!

You enter the Jungle Trek area, and look at the Komodo Dragon and Tapirs before heading closer to the tigers. It’s strange, but somehow you’ve never previously noticed the flower scents here, and also never previously realized what they were. You can detect jasmine, and honeysuckle, and find yourself quite smitten by the surroundings. God – wouldn’t it be lovely to be able to get off the path, find a quite spot, and just sit and let your senses explore.

As you continue one of the Disney ‘crew members’ appears from a door beside the path in front of you. Clearly she is in a hurry, and makes her way quickly back along the path where you had come from. However, in her haste she had not checked that the door had closed behind her, and in an instant you move towards it, and stop it from latching.

“Shit – what you doing Amy?” Michael hisses at you. “That’s for staff only.”

“Yeah, well, haven’t you ever wondered what’s hidden away behind here? Look - this is supposed to be an attraction that’s fun for everyone. I think I’ll have more fun having a sneak in here. Coming?...”

What will you do now?
1311221212122212.title: jasmine and honeysuckle

choices: Michael wants to check you out
13112212121222121.content:
Well, you had (in your original form as Michael) a pretty daring attitude towards challenges, and the new Michael has all of your original attributes too, and within seconds you are both through the door, and thus within the ‘Cast members only’ area.

You have entered what seems to be a locker room, leading into a storage area, and beyond that a passageway behind the artificial rock face leading towards the tiger enclosure. Fortunately it is deserted. You reckon the girl you saw leaving was heading out into the ‘public area’ for her tour of duty – and hopefully won’t return for a while.

You scan around the room. It is fairly small and functionally furnished, with a handful of lockers, a table and chairs, a fridge, and coffee maker. However you notice a rack with a small selection of uniforms – presumably spares in case of accidents or damage.

“This looks good.” You say to Michael. “You really don’t appreciate how easy it is for you. You can take your shirt off, and everything else pretty much hangs dries in situ.” His loose hanging shorts are almost dry already, and you know that he is wearing boxers underneath (as you always did). You wave your hand down over your body. “I’m still as wet as when we left the ride.”

Well, that wasn’t strictly true, although you’re well aware that your bra is starting to rub under your breasts and your panties are clinging damp and tight around your crotch.

“Who drinks coffee when it’s as hot as this?” Michael asks, almost to himself. He opens the fridge looking for a cool drink, and pulls out two cans of Sprite. “That’ll do nicely!” He turns and throws one of the cans towards you, which you catch easily. “Why don’t you get changed in there…” he indicates the door to the rest room, “and I can check out what’s here.”

You select one of the smaller outfits from the rack, and head into the rest room. Here you strip off completely, patting yourself dry with the towel hanging beside the sink, and slip on the jacket, buttoning this up. Similarly you pull on the little skirt. Whilst not ideal without your underwear, it at least feels significantly more comfortable than you had been, and your absence of panties was certainly not obvious. You look in the mirror and see that your makeup and hair have suffered as a consequence of your drenching. You know you really should tackle it, but realize that you don’t know what to do! Could really do with some Disney magic now! You open your shoulder bag, and find a hair brush, so you start brushing in the hope that it will improve your appearance a little. Another check in your bag reveals some make-up. You take a deep breath and begin….well, not brilliant, but it doesn’t seem too bad. After a couple of minutes you realize that by not concentrating on what you’re doing, the results are actually looking pretty good. Guess that’s your new body’s feminine side somehow kicking in.

You return to the locker room, where Michael has also changed into one of the Cast uniforms. “Wow, that suits you!” he says.

“Yeah, right. A low cut jacket with nothing underneath. Figures you’d like that!” you respond. You point towards the store . “Anything here of particular interest?”

“Only you. You're the sexiest Cast member I've seem all day!"

“Not what I meant!" you can feel yourself blushing slightly. "OK. So, what shall we do now?” you ask…
13112212121222121.title: Cast Members Only!

choices: You can't go anywhere without ID badges
131122121212221211.content:
"Come on" Michael says excitedly, "This is the closest we're ever likely to get to the tigers - on the inside of the outer perimeter, so let's go have a look."

Well, you are actually just as keen, although didn't want this to be too obvious in your current form as Amy. So you agree, and you both head through the storage area towards the walkway to the tigers' enclosure.

However, even before you leave the store room you hear the door from the park opening behind you. Oh bum, this will be awkward, being that you're not supposed to be here. You try to decide what would be the better course of action - carry on regardless, or turn back and face this newcomer...

However, you don't get the opportunity to pretend you're supposed to be here as you hear a sharp "Oi, you two! Hang on a minute!"

Oh blast. What is going to happen now?
131122121212221211.title: An interuption

choices: It has your name on it!
1311221212122212111.content:
You stop, and turn to see a guy in his thirties. "You can't go any further without your ID badges." he says.

You wait, wondering what will happen now, as clearly you don't have ID badges. Then it occurs to you that only you and Michael know that, and this guy cannot possibly know that your shouldn't be here or that you don't have ID, as he as the ID badges are on the uniform lapel, and he's only seen your back.

"Sorry!" Michael says, walking towards the Disney official, "We've only just started, and aren't too sure of all of the protocols yet." Yeah, typical you, trying to blag it. In fact, you were about to do the same thing.

"No worries, guys." he responds. You were both listed on today's roster sheet, so we got your badges ready for you."

Oh blimey, so they were actually expecting two new starters, and now you and Michael are going to walk off with their IDs.

He reaches into a pocket and draws out two lapel badges, glances at them, and hands on to each of you. "There you go. Attach them now, and then you're ready to go."

You pin yours to your jacket. Michael does likewise. You glance down at the inverted name on your badge...
1311221212122212111.title: Another surprise

1312.content:
You wake up. Mmm, you had been dreaming of Amy, and didn’t really want to stir, but you felt something wasn’t quite right. You stretched and were immediately aware of something pulling across your chest and shoulders. That’s funny, you thought, as you can remember having crashed out on you bed naked.

You open your eyes and look down. “What the hell!” You are wearing a bra, which is causing the unusual sensation, but you also notice that despite going to bed in the buff, you are now wearing girl’s panties as well!

You sit up and try to check everything else. Well, you are still yourself, and everything else appears normal except that you’re in girl’s underwear. Weird or what!

You immediately pull the bra straps off our shoulders, and with a bit of fiddling manage to undo the clasp, and it falls to the floor. You then remove the briefs too. Now, why would someone sneak into your room and dress you look that? The only suspect you have would be your sister Tamara, but why would she do that?

Something catches your eye, and you pick up the panties and examine them. Well, that’s peculiar. You remember Amy had a pair just like these – although pink cotton panties with a heart pattern obviously aren’t rare.

You decide to have a shower, then wrap the towel around your waist, and head for the chest of drawers to choose what to wear today. Tee shirt and shorts. You open your underwear drawer to grab a fresh pair of boxers, but there are none there. However, in their place you find a selection of bras and panties! OK – who’s the joker then?

You open your bedroom door and look out. Tammy was outside having her breakfast.
“OK, very funny.” you say to her. “We can do a swap back whenever you’re ready.”

Tamara looked rather quizzically at you. “Give me a clue?”

“Come on sis, you know full well. The underwear…”

She clearly hasn’t got a clue what you are talking about, but you can tell from the twinkle in her eye that she knows more than she’s admitting to. “OK,” you say to her “perhaps you could let me in on the secret.”

“Um, don’t suppose you had another card in your room this morning, did you?”

You return to your bedroom, and Tammy follows you in. Indeed, beside your bed is a fresh card. “Good morning Michael,” it read. “We have weaved a little Disney Magic around you today to ensure that your day fulfils your dream. Enjoy the day!”

“What the heck does that mean?” you ask.

“Well, it depend on what you were dreaming about last night.” Tammy replied. “Um, guess you didn’t actually dream of dressing up as a girl?”

“Oh course I Bloody didn’t!” you retort. You thought for a minute. “I had a dream about Amy. That was all!”

Tammy smirked. “Oh right. Hmm, I remember when you first met her you were besotted with her. Didn’t you say you’d do anything to get in her panties?”

“Well, yes, but I meant it metaphorically, not literally!”

You show Tammy your new underwear collection, and decide that you’ll just have a borrow something to wear from your Dad. His boxers may be a little loose around your waist, but better than trying to fit into something from your 10 year old brother.

You knock on your Dad’s bedroom. “Oh, he’s left already.” Tammy says. Fair enough. You open the door and go in, find a pair of your Dad’s boxers, and put them on. Then you return to your room, finish getting dressed, and return to the kitchen.

“Easily sorted.” You tell your sister.

“Don’t be so sure. That bit about weaving Disney magic around you – I’d reckon there’s more to this than we know.”

Yeah, well. You can worry about that later. Meanwhile you need to decide what to do today. You’re aware that they trialling a new backstage tour at Hollywood Studios, so thought you might give that one a go. “I might come too,” Tammy said. “I could do with some company today.”

You pop some bread in the toaster, and pour yourself a drink of orange juice. As you return the carton to the fridge you can feel something snag on your shoulder. You reach up to rub your shoulder with your free hand, and can feel something odd under your shirt.
1312.title: Amy's undies

13121.content:
“How the!” you exclaim, as you suddenly realise that you are again wearing a bra underneath your Tee shirt. The feeling of tightness in your crotch also suggests than something has happened down below. You undo your belt and drop your shorts, and indeed you are again wearing a pair of panties, the boxers having totally disappeared.

“Blimey. That was quick – didn’t even notice it.”

“Assuming these are all Amy’s undies,” Tammy says, “are they all the same size?”

“Dunno, why?”

“Well, it looks like you’re stuck wearing these today, whether you want to or not, so you may as well try to pick the one that will fit you best. Might find things get a bit tight down below if you’re not careful.”

You look down, and your crotch is certainly looking quite constrained within the low cut briefs. “Yeah, OK, maybe you’re right.”

You both go back to your room, and select the largest items, which you proceed to put on. This is a matching set in shocking pink satin. Clearly you didn’t have boobs to fill out the cups, so the material hangs relatively loose across your chest. The panties are quite low cut, clearly designed to sit on the hips rather than around the waist, but as Amy has wider hips than yours they aren’t uncomfortable.

Fortunately you didn’t mind being naked in front of your sister, by mutual agreement after too many near-misses on the bathroom run at home. “Very nice dear,” she says when you finish dressing. "Just don’t let too many people see – shocking pink isn’t really your color!”

“Why the heck do girls have underwear this color?” you ask, although you suspect you know the answer.

“Oh, couple of reasons. First it’s a really sexy color, but also so that it can be seen.”

Well you could agree on both counts, as you can remember catching glimpses of Amy’s colourful undies in the past, which made you want to see more and more of them, and of her….

So, was that the extent of the magic today? Well, hopefully now that you are apparently adhering to the expectations you can get on with the day.

For the second time this morning, you get ready to leave. Then you have a thought. “Um, what did you dream about last night then, sis?”

“Tell you later. But I think I want to keep you nearby today.”

You check yourself in the mirror just before you leave, primarily to ensure the shocking pink underwear isn’t showing through.
13121.title: All in pink

choices: Your top half has changed to be a girl
13122.content:
"What the?" you start. As you rub your shoulder your arm seems to rub against something bulging under your shirt where you know there shouldn't be anything bulging.

"What's the matter?" Tamara asks, with real concern in your voice.

"Dunno, seems to be a lump or something." You pull your shirt over your head and can immediate see that far from having a lump, you are developing two lumps - one either side of your chest. "Oh crap. What the frig's going on?"

"Well, I might be mistaken, but I think you may have been a bit premature in getting rid of the bra. You seem to be growing boobs."

"Think it may be just as well not to hit the park quite yet." Tammy says. "Perhaps you may want to sit around here for a few minutes to see what else happens."

"May not be such a bad idea." you reply, although you can detect something funny in the way you said it. With that everything around you seems to wobble slightly, and you sit down heavily.

"Wow" Tamara exclaims. "It's really weird watching you."

"Why? What's going on...?" you reply, now realizing that your voice is changing, increasing slightly in pitch.

You cross the room to the full length mirror, and look at the reflection..

You were having a blast at Walt Disneyworld, mostly because it was so HUGE. Despite not being tall enough to ride every ride, you had fun riding the ones you could.
That night, you were dreaming about your comic books. Your dad had gotten you hooked on them, and now you read them every night before bed. You often wondered about what it would be like to have superpowers, and tonight that thought carried over into your subconcious...
The next day, you find yourself...
14.title: Andy

info.brief_description: You are staying at Disney World, where your dreams really can come true....
info.description:
You have won a competition, and you have been invited with your family to stay in what was originally the Disney family suite in Cinderella’s Castle in Magic Kingdom, plus you have each been presented with a Disney ‘Magic Your Way Ultimate platinum’ ticket.

Wow, that’s pretty neat, you thought. However, you really should have read the small print on the tickets, as your Ultimate tickets have special Disney magical powers, which means that for the duration of your vacation your dreams really do come true…

Each night as you sleep some aspect of your subconscious dream (not necessarily of your choosing) will turn into reality the following day. It's up to you to decide what, and how you will cope with the results....

Basic rules please... all actions based on your character's dream (so need a brief idea of what that dream was, even if retrospectively!); everything should be based at or at least associated with Disney World; and as Disney is supposed to be a fun place, nothing too nasty please! Interactions with other family members (and similar or conflicting dreams and outcomes) encouraged! However, please try to complete the previous day for your character before embarking on a new dream!

One-liners welcome if relevant and maintain continuity of the story. Please join in and have some fun! - (I may edit but will keep this to a minimum, primarily spelling and grammar.)

Please join in and have a bit of fun!
info.pretty_title: Where your dreams really do come true
